mapper.select: SELECT GCI.GCOUN_NM, CS.CSL_NM, GCI.GCOUN_DT, GCA.GCOUN_STA_NM FROM GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT GCA JOIN GROUP_COUN_INFO GCI ON GCA.GCOUN_CD=GCI.GCOUN_CD JOIN COUNSELOR CS ON GCI.CSL_NO=CS.CSL_NO WHERE STUD_NO =#{userId}

SELECT ECT.COUN_NUM, ECT.COUN_NUM2, CS.CSL_NM, ECT.EMP_COUN_RSVT_YMD, ECT.EMP_COUN_RSVT_CD, ECT.USR_CN, ECT.EMP_STTS_CD FROM EMP_COUN_TAB ECT JOIN EMP_COUN_CAL ECC ON ECT.CAL_NUM=ECC.CAL_NUM JOIN COUNSELOR CS ON ECC.CSL_NO= CS.CSL_NO WHERE STUD_NO=#{userId}
SELECT `Key`, VISIT_RES_YMD, VISIT_RES_CD, COUN_PRO_CD FROM PSY_EXAM_VISIT_REQUEST WHERE STUD_NO=#{userId}
